creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: eight lines of expressive calligraphy written with a relatively thin brush; rectangular intaglio seal URC; circular relief stamp at L center
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio stamp; center of L edge, circular relief stamp; on back, LLQ, in pencil: [Tetto]
title: Poem Leaf
